## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (080d9a526b2fa1dfb746160c7757bf7789eed1d485d67252b5e5893bc3f0d939)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'bigcommerce.github.io' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
